comment: 마지막에 쿠키 있으니까 꼭 끝까지 봐주세요
Honestly, thank you for these lovely kawaii gyaru vlogs. It makes me want to strive harder to live as a gyaru. Please, keep doing these vlogs every now and then, i thoroughly enjoyed this one .
